Plot: A couple struggles to visit all four of their divorced parents on Christmas.
Title: Four Christmases
Writer: Matt Allen (screenplay), Caleb Wilson (screenplay), Jon Lucas (screenplay), Scott Moore (screenplay), Matt Allen (story), Caleb Wilson (story)
Actors: Vince Vaughn, Reese Witherspoon, Robert Duvall, Sissy Spacek
tomatoConsensus: Despite a strong cast, this sour holiday comedy suffers from a hackneyed script.
